properties.description: Load RDC masterlist data from smartsheet to Semarchy staging
ReProcess RetailCustomer Error Files from the error folder
Remove last 20 days old Retail Customer Archive CSV file from archive folder

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT INT

EXECUTE dbo.Count_SiteMaster_Changed_Records @SiteType = 'HS', @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT = null

SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT INT

EXECUTE dbo.Count_SiteMaster_Changed_Records @SiteType = 'WH', @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT = null

SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT DISTINCT 
          LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
          LIC_CONTACT, 
          COMPANY_CODE,
		  GetDate() as LOAD_DATE
FROM DBO.GD_LEGAL_ENTITY WITH(NOLOCK)

value.value: @concat('Data Not Found from Date ',variables('ModifiedDateFrom'),' to Date ',variables('ModifiedDateTo'))
